project_descr: mitigate the impact of the current crisis on local households and communities and assist their recovery

outputs.output_descr: Target the rehabilitation of more schools to complement the current work under YECRP under, Output “Communities benefit from community assets” and contribute to the urgent response to prevent the unprecedented health and environmental disaster of Cholera
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
